title: Incorrect zh-Hans XML documentation expression for Resx.Designer file generated by StronglyTypedResourceBuilder
body:
<!-- This is a template that helps us provide quicker feedback. Please use any relevant sections and delete anything you don't need. -->

### Issue Description
<!--
* Please include a clear and concise description of the problem.
-->
This issue is actually a translation suggestion, but is also a bug/regression because the translation is worse than before.

The `xxx.Designer.vb` file generated from `xxx.resx`.by `StronglyTypedResourceBuilder` is using incorrect zh-Hans localized XML documentation for `xxx.Culture` property. (Assume `xxx` is the name of Resx file.)

### Steps to Reproduce
<!--
* Include as much of the following as possible:

* A minimal sample project that reproduces the issue.
* Your zipped project.
* IDE / CLI steps to create the project and reproduce the behaviour.
* Your command line invocation
-->
* Create a new Visual Basic / C# .NET Core console project on in Visual Studio 2019 on Windows with zh-CN locale
* Add a new Resx file to the project
* Open the corresponding `.Designer.vb/cs` file and check generated code
* As comparison, create a console project on Visual Studio 2013/2015 with the same steps above.

### Expected Behavior
<!--
* The expected output or behavior.
-->
This is the generated code on VS 2013/2015
```cs
        /// <summary>
        ///   使用此强类型资源类，为所有资源查找
        ///   重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性。
        /// </summary>
        [global::System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute(global::System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
        internal static global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo Culture {
            get {
                return resourceCulture;
            }
            set {
                resourceCulture = value;
            }
        }
```

### Actual Behavior
<!--
* The actual output or behavior.
-->
This is the generated code on VS 2019. Note the first line of `<summary>` is incorrect and is the duplicate of the second line.
```cs
        /// <summary>
        ///   重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性
        ///   重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性。
        /// </summary>
        [global::System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute(global::System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
        internal static global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo Culture {
            get {
                return resourceCulture;
            }
            set {
                resourceCulture = value;
            }
        }
```

### Analysis
<!--
* If you have an idea where the problem might lie, let us know that here.
* Please include any pointers to code, relevant changes, or related issues you know of.
-->
I found this issue when migrating some old projects authored in VS 2013/2015 and this documentation change generates noises for version control system.

The code snippet above is generated by
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/e8c17c128ed847d4acd278b42a02df9621bd1652/src/Tasks/system.design/stronglytypedresourcebuilder.cs#L454-L455

and the corresponding value in neutral locale is
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/e8c17c128ed847d4acd278b42a02df9621bd1652/src/Tasks/system.design/system.design.txt#L19-L20

I haven't found the file hosting localized resources, so I open the issue in hope that the value of `CulturePropertyComment1` in zh-Hans locale can be corrected.

### Versions & Configurations
<!--
* In a Visual Studio developer command prompt, run `msbuild -version` and paste the output here.
* If applicable, include the version of the tool that invokes MSBuild (Visual Studio, dotnet CLI, etc):

* Post any other relevant configuration settings here.
*   OS, architecture, etc.
-->
```powershell
PS > dotnet msbuild -version
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 16.8.0-preview-20371-01+e8338f5ad for .NET
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

16.8.0.37101
PS > dotnet --list-sdks
1.1.13 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
2.1.800 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
2.2.104 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
3.1.102 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
3.1.400 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
5.0.100-rc.1.20374.4 [C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk]
PS > dotnet --version
5.0.100-rc.1.20374.4
```

### Attach a binlog
<!--
* If providing us a project that reproduces the issue proves difficult, consider including a binlog.
* Click [here](https://aka.ms/msbuild/binlog) for details on sharing binary logs.
* Click [here](https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/wiki/Binary-Log.md) for more information on binary logs.
    NOTE: Binlogs can contain sensitive information. Don't attach anything you don't want to be public.

*   To view the contents of the binlogs yourself, you may wish to use a tool like https://msbuildlog.com/.
-->

nodes.body: I'm the new loc pm. I am investingating this issue as well.
Team Triage: Closing due to fix in later version of VS.
